§ 60112. Transfer of Landsat 6 program responsibilities The responsibilities of the Secretary with respect to Landsat 6 shall be transferred to the Landsat Program Management, as agreed to between the Secretary and the Landsat Program Management, pursuant to section 60111 of this title. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3413.)
